sentences.en: Abstract: Luxury consumption is always connected with motivation of flaunt.
sentences.cn: 摘要: 消费的奢侈性通常被认为与炫耀动机有关.

sentences.en: Candy: Why cover up your body? If you've got it, flaunt it.
sentences.cn: 坎蒂: 为什么埋没你的好身材? 假如你拥有, 就炫耀它吧.

sentences.en: Even though Mr. B possesses unique grey matter, he does not flaunt himself.
sentences.cn: 即使B先生才智不凡, 他也不夸耀自己.

sentences.en: Flaunt your age and you must not have much longer to live.
His behavior was an outrageous flaunt.
sentences.cn: 他的行为是一种无耻的炫耀.

sentences.en: If you have lots of money, do you like to flaunt it?
sentences.cn: 如果很富有, 你会想要去炫耀 吗 ?

sentences.en: Luxury consumption is always connected with motivation of flaunt.
sentences.cn: 消费的奢侈性通常被认为与炫耀动机有关.

sentences.en: NO need flaunt , Qiao has attracted a lot of attention.
sentences.cn: 无需炫耀, 但桥新家具已深深吸引住无数视线.

sentences.en: Once you know what your brand stands for and promises, don't be afraid to flaunt it.
sentences.cn: 一旦你知道你的品牌意味着什么以及品牌承诺, 就别害怕炫耀.

sentences.en: Rather than hiding their personalization capability under layers of turgid policy - speak , they should flaunt it.
sentences.cn: 与其让个性化功能隐藏在冗长的协议之下, 还不如大力宣扬这种功能.

sentences.en: The baseballer flaunt his cup to his friends.
sentences.cn: 那名棒球选手向他的朋友炫耀他的奖杯.

sentences.en: The remaining mouth trying to flaunt , his eyes unable to support.
sentences.cn: 剩下嘴巴逞强眼睛无力支撑.

sentences.en: The rich flaunted their wealth while the poor starved on the streets.
sentences.cn: 富人摆阔，穷人却在大街上饿肚子。

sentences.en: To flaunt that with such a lack of sensitivity to professional decorum is very disquieting.
sentences.cn: 这样卖弄自己只能说明他很缺乏对专业礼仪的敏感度,是非常令人不安的行为.

sentences.en: While the girls try to make the cut the guys get to flaunt their considerable wealth.
sentences.cn: 在女孩们试图晋级的同时,男士们则可以夸耀他们的巨额财富.

sentences.en: Why would you flaunt that on a public forum?
sentences.cn: 为什么你们会在公共论坛大肆炫耀?

phrases.phrase: if you've got it, flaunt it
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)有了（财富，品质），就要表现出来；有则显之

trans.tran_en: to show your money, success, beauty etc so that other people notice it – used to show disapproval
